Name: Loud Speaker Cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . Under his recipe: 1/8 lemon juice, 1/8 Cointreau, 3/8 dry gin and 3/8 brandy, Craddock states, "This it is that gives to Radio Announcers their peculiar enunciation. Three of them will produce oscillation, and after five it is possible to reach the osculation stage."
Nutrition: One serving of Loud Speaker Cocktail contains 158 calories
